titleStmt.title: Scala c≈ìli Nineteen sermons concerning prayer. The first sixe guiding to the true doore: the residue teaching how so to knocke thereat that wee may enter. The former part containing a preparation to prayer, the latter an exposition vpon the seuerall petitions of the Lords prayer.
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.
